-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c1)

comment: Two ways to say that a collection ` B ( i ) ` for ` i e. A ` is disjoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
